name: Candace Wins
text: Customer service was good. The lady at the front was really nice. Pizza was ready fast. Pizza wasnt that great. The cheese tasted funny and it could have cooked longer. Probably why it was ready quickly.  There were pushing orders out fast

name: cra2006 cra2006
text: I've been going to this pizza hut for a long time and I only live 5 mins away. This is one of the best pizza huts I've been to. Every time I get my pizza, it's perfect and it looks like a picture from a magazine. Check out my picture.

text: Yesterday was the first time we went to this magnificent restaurant. But It is definitely not the last time. We enjoyed the evening a lot with the good service, with the fine  food and booze and with the comfortable pay. We will no doubt go back there soon.
